full_summary:
**Title**
W1941-230016 - Conveyor Systems Dismantling Services
---------------

**Tender  Information**
WS3705620095-Doc3714101524

**Request for Proposal**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to acquire Conveyor Systems Dismantling Services in Montreal, QC.

**Tender Scope**
The RFP details the dismantling of conveyors as outlined in Annex B, and all supporting documentation and bid submissions must adhere to the requirements specified in the RFP.

**Tender Bid**
The tender bid must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on November 17, 2022. Any bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

**Key Information**
•Procurement Category: SRV
•Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
•Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
•Attended Countries/Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
•Region of Delivery: Montreal, QC

**Contact Information**
If you require any clarification or additional information regarding this RFP, please contact Luc Brunet, contracting officer, at luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender URL**
The full RFP can be found at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14460849?extsite=MTQ0NjA4NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
---------------

**Note**
All information provided must be in English or French, and all bids must conform to the requirements outlined in the RFP. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to accept or reject any bid in whole or in part. The tender bid closing date is November 17, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.  Please refer to the link provided above for the full RFP.
